FuncDef: The display aaa user-group command displays information about user groups.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the name of a user group.
If user-group-name is specified, the device displays information about the specified user group.
If no user group is specified, the device displays information about all the user groups.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters containing letters, digits, and underscores (_). The value can not contain the following characters or symbols: \, /, :, *, | , ?, ", <, >

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the running status of the device, view the configurations of the device, or locate the problem of the user group, you can run the display aaa user-group command to check the configurations of the user group.
Prerequisites
You can view information only about user groups that have been created through the user-group command.
